attributes.action: Allow driving tests and lessons to run during the new lockdown
attributes.additional_details: Because for many many months tests have been cancelled changed moved and it has been extremely frustrating. Also for many people it’s their only chance of getting a job And getting to and from work. And for many people it means a great deal.
attributes.background: If colleges,schools,university are all still open when you can sit in a classroom for up to and hour and a half with no PPE driving tests and lessons should go ahead when in a car with an examiner/instructors whilst wearing masks for an hour and the car is cleaned before and after every use

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557462
